data.title: Kazuo Nakamura
data.meta_description: Kazuo Nakamura was born in Vancouver and interned during WW2 in a prisoner of war camp in British Columbia. Moved to Hamilton after the war...
data.text:
Provenance

Private collection, Toronto.

Biography:

Kazuo Nakamura was born in Vancouver and interned during WW2 in a prisoner of war camp in British Columbia. Moved to Hamilton after the war for a brief period and then to Toronto. Graduated from Central Technical School as a commercial artist in 1951. The Art Gallery of Ontario has the largest holdings of the artistâ€™s works.
